resources.string: First Name can not be empty
Email address can not be empty
Username must be at least 2 and at most 6 characters long
You must type a valid email address
Unknown error, please, get in contact with the BioVoice team.
Your device is not connected to the Internet
You are not connected to a WiFi network
The URL for the API you have introduced does not seem to be valid. Check API URL in app settings and try again.
Could not connect to BioVoiceAPI. The server may be down or the connection is too slow. Try again in a few minutes or check API URL in app settings.
Could not connect to BioVoiceAPI. Try again in a few minutes or check API URL in app settings.
The response from the server was not a valid response. Maybe the API URL in the settings is pointing to the wrong server or something is broken.
There is no external storage available to record audio. Free some memory from your phone or insert an SD card and try again.
The user has been successfully registered in the system with the following data:
Now, you can either proceed to the enrollment process or go back to the main screen of the app.
You can enroll or test a user\'s identity. Fill up the username and the system will take care of heading you to the proper action.

This user is not enrolled yet, tap on the microphone button to start recording your voice and tap again to stop. Once you have recorded your voice enrollment, will be available. It is highly recommended that you record at least one minute of your voice for the system to generate an accurate model of it.

This user is already enrolled. You can re-enroll its voice or perform the user verification of your voice against him. Tap on the microphone button to start recording your voice and tap again to stop. Once you have recorded your voice, the different actions will be available.
The value obtained in the speaker verification process is higher than the declared threshold, so it is likely that the voice sample belongs to the user.
The value obtained in the speaker verification process is lower than the declared threshold, so it is not likely that the voice sample belongs to the user.
The user has been successfully enrolled. You can now re-enroll or perform the speaker verification against the model just created.
